message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm offering it to you for $130. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $130 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $115 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget concerns. I'm willing to come down to $125. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $122 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
